channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: The co-founder of MyCatholicDoctor, Kathleen Berchelmann M.D., is back to speak with Jim and Joy about how she and her organization are reclaiming Catholic healthcare in America. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina debunk the common misconception that faith and science are opposed to one another. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the first step of the Examen, Gratitude, when one notices the gifts that God?s love has given them and to give Him thanks. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Dr. Lawrence Feingold, formerly agnostic, shares the realization that led him to the Catholic Church and the inner peace he felt after his conversion. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Exile Of Mary Magdalene
channel.desc: Examine how history gives a reasonable account of Mary Magdalene's exile in France, including a look at what is generally accepted as her hermit cave in the cliff of St. Baume and how it reveals the spirituality of a woman who truly loved Christ. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Revelation: The Second Coming
channel.desc: CH. 21 THE HEAVENLY KINGDOM. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug answer questions about the miraculous image of Our Lady of Guadalupe on the tilma of St Juan Diego, and what happens to the souls of aborted babies. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Hallie Lord, author of "On the Other Side of Fear: How I Found Peace," shares her strategy for breaking free from fear and embracing hope and gratitude. Hosted by Johnnette Benkovic, part 5 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Jonas Soto interviews Mons. Aldo Berardi, O.SS.T, Vicar Apostolic of Norther Arabia about the thriving Catholic Church in Northern Arabia despite restrictions to religious freedom. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: In the second sorrowful mystery, Pilate has Jesus scourged twice. It causes innumerable wounds throughout his body and an enormous amount of blood lost, but Jesus shows his love for humanity by sacrificing himself. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints And Heroes
channel.desc: The thrilling story of Christopher Columbus?s first sea voyage as a boy to his first step ashore in the Americas. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: Things go wrong at the Donut Shop when everyone is late to work, but Fr. Joe gets them back on track with a reminder to start all things with prayer and a lesson from the Massterpiece Machine. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica explains how the Catholic Church is built on trust. She quotes from Matthew, Chapter 6 about how important it is to trust in God's providence. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: To The Top Pier Giorgio Frassati
channel.desc: Filmed in Italy, this docudrama chronicles the life and spirituality of Pier Giorgio Frassati, an Italian activist who put his Catholic beliefs into practice to help the poor and downtrodden in his hometown of Turin. (90 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Bob Dolan welcomes Pat McCaskey, a member of the ownership family of the Chicago Bears to discuss his work there, the National Football League and his relationship with Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: Chris Steffanick and two of his teenage children embark on a mission to Haiti, where they serve at an orphanage and work with some of the world's poorest people. Part 2 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Kathleen Berchelmann M.D., speaks about how she and her organization, MyCatholicDoctor, are continuing the 2000-year-old healing ministry of Jesus Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: Steve Venable?s encounters with scandalous and non-traditional ideologies within different Protestant faiths led him to pray and search for the Truth found within the Catholic Faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford explains that Christ expects each Christian to spread the message of His love and to live the Christian life as He directed us to do so while He was on earth. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Soudan Et Vous Ne Pleurez Pas Avec Nous
channel.desc: Sudan's strained relationship between Christians and Muslims over the centuries has turned to one of outright persecution. Produced by Aid to the Church in Need. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: Originally from the Dominican Republic, Elbyn Mustafa wandered away from the faith during college, but thanks to God?s grace came home to the Church through Reconciliation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother reflects on how the Act of Contrition beseeches for both forgiveness and the strength to not commit sins again. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fr. Stanley Rother American Martyr
channel.desc: After struggling with his studies in the seminary, a young priest from Oklahoma discerns his call to serve Guatemala?s native people, no matter the cost. Hosted by Fr. Charles Connor. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews his Excellency Bishop Emmanuel Kanon Rozario, the bishop of the Barishal diocese in Bangladesh where Catholics make up a tiny minority of the inhabitants. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! The Choices We Face
channel.desc: From the 2024 Lift Jesus Higher Rally, Myles Vosylius shares his testimony about his parent?s divorce and how he found God?s unwavering love amidst that time in his life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: Mother looks into trust and fear - one a virtue and one a vice. If we fail to trust God, we become filled with fear. It will ultimately condemn us to a live an eternity without God?s love. It is our choice, so choose wisely. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Susan Conroy explains Blessed Mother Teresa of Calcutta's humility. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Learn about a technique to help parents teach lasting lessons to quarreling siblings. Plus, HeartBeat International?s director outlines her approach to transforming relationships. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: When both saint and scoundrel are confronted with their fates, Maximilian Kolbe still chooses to trust Christ?s Divine Will, and embrace his suffering and eventual martyrdom. Part 2 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Msgr. Daniel Gallagher discusses with Fr. Leo the use of Latin in the Church as a bond among all Catholics. They prepare a favorite dish of Fr. Leo's when he was a seminarian in Rome. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
channel.desc: Today?s episode focuses on the theological and cardinal virtues of the Holy Spirit. Everyone battles sin, but cultivating a life of virtue gives us the ability to break the pattern, putting order and harmony in our lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of Saint Joseph
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this inspirational litany asking for the prayers of Saint Joseph from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Explore the Lourdes Archives and see the actual rock on which the feet of the Mother of God stood, letters by St. Bernadette written in her own hand, and other fascinating Lourdes treasures rarely seen by the public. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen says that at a time when man has more and more material conditions for happiness, he's multiplying wars. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Revelation: The Second Coming
channel.desc: CH. 22 THEY WILL SEE HIM FACE TO FACE AND HIS NAME WRITTEN ON THEIR FOREHEADS. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about older Catechisms of the Catholic Church, forgetting sins when in confession, and why Protestants say Augustine and Aquinas were Calvinists. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explain why even the problem of evil cannot swallow up the fact that God exists. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Truth In The Heart
channel.desc: Sister Thomas Aquinas explains how the bishops and the Pope can trace their line of authority back to the 12 Apostles in this engaging catechetical lesson for children (Grade Level 2). (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: Thomas and his wife Helen teach their children Alex and Sarah abbout the life of St. Dominic Savio. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: On today?s show, host Joseph Pearce reviews a classic storiy of pride and vanity in Oscar Wilde?s ?The Picture of Dorian Gray.? He also examines the pilgrimages of Hilaire Belloc in ?The Path to Rome and ?The Four Men.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Adoration And Reparation
channel.desc: A special presentation of the Chaplet of Adoration and Reparation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Noelle Mering analyzes the ?woke? movement, and offers an alternative rooted in deep interpersonal relationships and the human need to live in truth, and to be known and loved. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: How can we bring out the Gold Rule in people, perhaps in a business or a nonprofit organization? (30 minutes).
